snippet: The victims of the attack on the National Bardo Museum in Tunis were mostly foreigners, and their families have begun arriving to take them home.
abstract: Tunisian authorities spend day evacuating dead and wounded foreign tourists and burying Tunisian dead in aftermath of terrorist attack on National Bardo Museum in Tunis, which killed 23 people; Pres Beji Caid Essebsi says in Independence Day speech that Islamic State group claimed responsibility and that security forces believe claim to be true.
lead_paragraph: The victims of the attack on the National Bardo Museum in Tunis were mostly foreigners, and their families have begun arriving to take them home.

headline.main: In Tunisia, Taking Stock of the Dead, and the Survivors
headline.print_headline: In Tunisia, Taking Stock of the Dead, and the Survivors

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
